A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A very weak story. 
The chief villain was reduced to paper in a short scene and the legend of the franchise Luke became a shadow of his former self.  The plot did not benefit from these "twists. It just ruined the build up from the force awakens and made the movie less entertaining. What's a sci fi story without a proper hero and villain. 

Rey is unrealistic and feels more like femenist propaganda than a female protagonist. Kylo Ren has no depth ot impact \,he is neither good nor evil\, just stagnating in between.
The side cast is occasionally entertaining but far to much time was wasted on their futile endeavours.  Overall this a very weak story and a disgrace to such a beloved franchise.
